experiment_info.name: Gradient Boosting with Feature Engineering
experiment_info.objective: Develop a binary classification model to predict term deposit subscription

feature_engineering: One-hot encoding for job and month categories

top_features.name: duration_log
top_features.description: Log-transformed call duration - most predictive feature

top_features.name: pdays
top_features.description: Days since last contact from previous campaign

strengths: Excellent ROC-AUC of 0.938 indicating strong discriminative power
Feature engineering significantly improved predictive power
Very high specificity (96.6%) - excellent at identifying non-subscribers
Strong performance on majority class with F1-score of 94.8%
weaknesses: Low recall for minority class (46.1%) - missing 54% of actual subscribers
Class imbalance significantly impacts minority class performance
Moderate precision (64.0%) indicates some false positive subscribers
Balanced accuracy (71.3%) shows room for improvement in minority class handling
key_insights: Duration-related features are by far the most important predictors
Engineered features significantly outperform original raw features
Previous campaign information (pdays, poutcome) provides strong predictive signal
Class imbalance (7.55:1) is the primary limiting factor for business impact
Model excels at avoiding false positives but struggles with false negatives

positive: High specificity reduces wasted effort on unlikely subscribers
Strong overall accuracy provides confidence in model reliability
Feature importance insights guide future data collection priorities
challenges: Low recall means missing 54% of potential subscribers
Moderate precision leads to some wasted marketing effort
Class imbalance limits direct business value despite strong technical metrics

hypotheses_validated: Duration, previous campaigns, and demographics identified as key predictors
unexpected_findings: Despite excellent ROC-AUC, recall remains challenging due to class imbalance
Engineered duration features show even stronger importance than expected
Monthly seasonal features show modest but consistent importance

next_iteration_priorities.approach: Implement SMOTE or advanced sampling techniques

next_iteration_priorities.expected_impact: Optimize precision-recall trade-off for business value
Capture complementary patterns for improved performance

debugging_issues: Initial sklearn import error for calibration_curve - resolved
Plotly hovertemplate typo in confusion matrix plot - resolved
